Detailed Description

A constrained optimizer that uses an analytic Lagrangian solution technique.

Analytic Lagrangian optimizer in the null-space with Beta form constraints. Similar to the formulation of the FullSpace method (see the AnalyticLagrangianFSBetaOptimizer class), but as the solution is in the null-space, the sum of ti constraint can be omitted.
